titles: A little treatise concerning trial of spirits: taken for the most part our of the works of the R.F. Robert Parsons, of the Societie of Iesus. Whereunto is added a comparison of a true Roman Catholike with a Protestant, wherby may bee discouered the difference of their spirits. With an appendix taken out of a later writer
author: Parsons, Robert, 1546-1610.
notes: Another issue, enlarged, with cancel title page, of: Parsons, Robert.  A little treatise concerning triall of spirits.
Place of publication from and press conjectured by STC.
"A comparison of a true Roman Catholike with a Protestant" and "A speech of Cardinall Baronius placed in the beginning of the second tome of his Annals" have caption title.
Running title reads: The difference betweene a Catholike and Protestant spirit.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Catholic Church --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
Catholic Church --  Doctrines --  Early works to 1800.
